Doc: Ravenchief, if you want to look from above, you're welcome. I'll
join =
the boat patrol and try to refit the scanners so we can see if
he's underwa=
ter.

He plunges from great height, not noticing a metal bird as he does.
S=
till scanning the sea's surface, his left rear wheel is about to
collide wi=
th Myrmidon...
